sqlMap.select: select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, tt. N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, tt.MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, tt.BLINCE_STARTDATE ,tt.BLINCE_ENDDATE, tt.BLINCE_VERIFY, tt.CID_VERIFY, tt.PROVINCE, tt.CITY, tt.AREA, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_DATE, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, tt.D_CREATE_DATE, tt. N_CREATED, tt.D_MODIFY_DATE, tt.N_MODIFIED, tt.N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, tt.CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE, LOCATION,BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER, BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION, BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT,BUSINESS_SCOPE, REGISTER_BANKROLL,BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, tt.CREDIT_RATING, tt.PHONE, tt.TRCCOPY_VERIFY, tt.GTC_VERIFY, tt.ATAX_VERIFY, tt.TAXPAYER_IDNUMBER, tt.CERTIFICATE_OTHERSID, tt.TAX_REG_CERTIFICATE_COPY, tt.G_TAXPAYER_CERTIFICATE, tt.RATING_DESCRIPTION, lr.IS_VALID, AUTHENTICATION_STATUS, rr.rank_name as RANK_NAME, uu.level_name as LEVEL_NAME from LOGIN_INFO ll, COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO tt,PERSONALITY_INFO pp,USER_LEVEL uu,RANK rr, login_rose_rel lr where ll.N_LOGIN_ID = pp.N_LOGIN_ID(+) and ll.n_level_id = uu.n_level_id(+) and pp.n_rank_id = rr.n_rank_id(+) and ll.N_LOGIN_ID = tt.N_LOGIN_ID and lr.n_commercial_id=tt.n_commercial_tenant_id and tt.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #n_CommercialTenantId:DECIMAL#

select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_DATE, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_DATE, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_DATE, N_MODIFIED,N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE,CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE,LOCATION,BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER,BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION, BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT,BUSINESS_SCOPE,REGISTER_BANKROLL,BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT,BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME,COMPANY_ACCOUNT,AUTHENTICATION_STATUS from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO where N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS=1 and N_LOGIN_ID = #n_LoginId:DECIMAL# and rownum=1

select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, tt.MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE,ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_FOUND_DATE,tt.D_CREATE_DATE, POSTALCODE,LEVEL_NAME,cc.name CUSTOMER_NAME from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO tt,LOGIN_INFO ll,BNES_CUSTOMER_TYPE cc, USER_LEVEL uu where tt.N_LOGIN_ID = ll.N_LOGIN_ID and cc.customer_type_id=ll.n_customer_type_id and ll.n_level_id=uu.n_level_id and tt.N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS=1 and N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #n_CommercialTenantId:DECIMAL#
select * from LOGIN_ROSE_REL t where t.N_COMMERCIAL_ID=#commercialTenantId#

select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_DATE, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_DATE, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_DATE, N_MODIFIED from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert:
select seq_app_login.nextval from dual
insert into COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO (N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_DATE, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_DATE, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_DATE, N_MODIFIED, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER,BLINCE_STARTDATE,BLINCE_ENDDATE,BLINCE_VERIFY,CID_VERIFY,PROVINCE,CITY,AREA,CERTIFICATE_OTHERSID,BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER) values (#n_CommercialTenantId#, #n_LoginId#, #contactsName#, #contactsDepartment#, #fixedPhone#, #mobile#, #contactsEmail#, #corporateName#, #corporateLocation#, #corporateProperty#, #corporateTrade#, #n_EnterpriseNumberOfPeople#, #d_FoundDate#, #n_EnterpriseStatus#, #postalcode#, #uploadBusinessLicencePictur#, #organizationCode#, #enterpriseLegalRepresentativ#, #enterpriseRealmName#, #d_CreateDate#, #n_Created#, #d_ModifyDate#, #n_Modified#,#n_CertificateType#, #certificateNumber#,#blinceStartdate#,#blinceEnddate#,#blinceVerify#,#cidVerify#,#province#,#city#,#area#,#certificateOthersid#,#businessLicenceRegister#)
sqlMap.update: update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO set N_LOGIN_ID = #n_LoginId:DECIMAL#, CONTACTS_NAME = #contactsName:VARCHAR#, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT = #contactsDepartment:VARCHAR#, FIXED_PHONE = #fixedPhone:VARCHAR#, MOBILE = #mobile:VARCHAR#, CONTACTS_EMAIL = #contactsEmail:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_NAME = #corporateName:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_LOCATION = #corporateLocation:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_PROPERTY = #corporateProperty:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_TRADE = #corporateTrade:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER = #businessLicenceRegister:VARCHAR#, BLINCE_STARTDATE=#blinceStartdate:DATE#, BLINCE_ENDDATE=#blinceEnddate:DATE#, BLINCE_VERIFY=#blinceVerify:DECIMAL#, CID_VERIFY=#cidVerify:DECIMAL#, PROVINCE=#province:VARCHAR#, CITY=#city:VARCHAR#, AREA=#area:VARCHAR#, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE = #n_EnterpriseNumberOfPeople:DECIMAL#, D_FOUND_DATE = #d_FoundDate:DATE#, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS = #n_EnterpriseStatus:DECIMAL#, POSTALCODE = #postalcode:VARCHAR#, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #uploadBusinessLicencePictur:VARCHAR#, ORGANIZATION_CODE = #organizationCode:VARCHAR#, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #enterpriseLegalRepresentativ:VARCHAR#, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #enterpriseRealmName:VARCHAR#, D_MODIFY_DATE = #d_ModifyDate:DATE#, N_MODIFIED = #n_Modified:DECIMAL#, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #n_CertificateType:DECIMAL#, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = #certificateNumber:VARCHAR# where N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #n_CommercialTenantId:DECIMAL#

update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO
N_LOGIN_ID = #n_LoginId:DECIMAL#
CONTACTS_NAME = #contactsName:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT = #contactsDepartment:VARCHAR#
FIXED_PHONE = #fixedPhone:VARCHAR#
MOBILE = #mobile:VARCHAR#
CREDIT_RATING = #creditRating:VARCHAR#
TAXPAYER_IDNUMBER = #taxpayerIdnumber#
BANK_OF_DEPOSIT = #bankOfDeposit#
BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME=#bankAccountName#
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #companyAccount#
PHONE = #phone#
ATAX_VERIFY = #ataxVerify:DECIMAL#
TRCCOPY_VERIFY = #trccopyVerify:DECIMAL#
GTC_VERIFY = #gtcVerify:DECIMAL#
BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER = #businessLicenceRegister:VARCHAR#
BLINCE_STARTDATE=#blinceStartdate:DATE#
BLINCE_ENDDATE=#blinceEnddate:DATE#
BLINCE_VERIFY=#blinceVerify:DECIMAL#
CID_VERIFY=#cidVerify:DECIMAL#
PROVINCE=#province:VARCHAR#
CITY=#city:VARCHAR#
AREA=#area:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_EMAIL = #contactsEmail:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_NAME = #corporateName:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_LOCATION = #corporateLocation:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_PROPERTY = #corporateProperty:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_TRADE = #corporateTrade:VARCHAR#
N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE = #n_EnterpriseNumberOfPeople:DECIMAL#
D_FOUND_DATE = #d_FoundDate:DATE#
N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS = #n_EnterpriseStatus:DECIMAL#
POSTALCODE = #postalcode:VARCHAR#
UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #uploadBusinessLicencePictur:VARCHAR#
CERTIFICATE_OTHERSID = #certificateOthersid:VARCHAR#
CERTIFICATE_PICTURE = #certificatePicture#
TAX_REG_CERTIFICATE_COPY = #taxRegCertificateCopy:VARCHAR#
G_TAXPAYER_CERTIFICATE = #taxpayerCertificate:VARCHAR#
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #organizationCode:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #enterpriseLegalRepresentativ:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #enterpriseRealmName:VARCHAR#
D_CREATE_DATE = #d_CreateDate:DATE#
N_CREATED = #n_Created:DECIMAL#
D_MODIFY_DATE = #d_ModifyDate:DATE#
N_MODIFIED = #n_Modified:DECIMAL#
N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #n_CertificateType:DECIMAL#
CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = #certificateNumber:VARCHAR#
AUTHENTICATION_STATUS = #authenticationStatus:DECIMAL#
RATING_DESCRIPTION = #ratingDescription#
where N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #n_CommercialTenantId:DECIMAL#

update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO
CORPORATE_NAME = #corporateName#
MOBILE = #mobile#
FIXED_PHONE = #fixedPhone#
BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER = #businessLicenceRegister#
BLINCE_STARTDATE=#blinceStartdate#
BLINCE_ENDDATE=#blinceEnddate#
D_MODIFY_DATE = #d_ModifyDate#
UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #uploadBusinessLicencePictur#
where N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #n_CommercialTenantId# AND N_LOGIN_ID = #n_LoginId#

update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO
N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #record.n_CommercialTenantId:DECIMAL#
N_LOGIN_ID = #record.n_LoginId:DECIMAL#
CONTACTS_NAME = #record.contactsName:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT = #record.contactsDepartment:VARCHAR#
FIXED_PHONE = #record.fixedPhone:VARCHAR#
MOBILE = #record.mobile:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_EMAIL = #record.contactsEmail:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_NAME = #record.corporateName:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_LOCATION = #record.corporateLocation:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_PROPERTY = #record.corporateProperty:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_TRADE = #record.corporateTrade:VARCHAR#
N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE = #record.n_EnterpriseNumberOfPeople:DECIMAL#
D_FOUND_DATE = #record.d_FoundDate:DATE#
N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS = #record.n_EnterpriseStatus:DECIMAL#
POSTALCODE = #record.postalcode:VARCHAR#
UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #record.uploadBusinessLicencePictur:VARCHAR#
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #record.organizationCode:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #record.enterpriseLegalRepresentativ:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #record.enterpriseRealmName:VARCHAR#
D_CREATE_DATE = #record.d_CreateDate:DATE#
N_CREATED = #record.n_Created:DECIMAL#
D_MODIFY_DATE = #record.d_ModifyDate:DATE#
N_MODIFIED = #record.n_Modified:DECIMAL#

update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO set N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #record.n_CommercialTenantId:DECIMAL#, N_LOGIN_ID = #record.n_LoginId:DECIMAL#, CONTACTS_NAME = #record.contactsName:VARCHAR#, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT = #record.contactsDepartment:VARCHAR#, FIXED_PHONE = #record.fixedPhone:VARCHAR#, MOBILE = #record.mobile:VARCHAR#, CONTACTS_EMAIL = #record.contactsEmail:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_NAME = #record.corporateName:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_LOCATION = #record.corporateLocation:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_PROPERTY = #record.corporateProperty:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_TRADE = #record.corporateTrade:VARCHAR#, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE = #record.n_EnterpriseNumberOfPeople:DECIMAL#, D_FOUND_DATE = #record.d_FoundDate:DATE#, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS = #record.n_EnterpriseStatus:DECIMAL#, POSTALCODE = #record.postalcode:VARCHAR#, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #record.uploadBusinessLicencePictur:VARCHAR#, ORGANIZATION_CODE = #record.organizationCode:VARCHAR#, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #record.enterpriseLegalRepresentativ:VARCHAR#, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #record.enterpriseRealmName:VARCHAR#, D_CREATE_DATE = #record.d_CreateDate:DATE#, N_CREATED = #record.n_Created:DECIMAL#, D_MODIFY_DATE = #record.d_ModifyDate:DATE#, N_MODIFIED = #record.n_Modified:DECIMAL#
update login_rose_rel set STATUS =3 where N_LOGIN_ID=#n_LoginId:DECIMAL# and STATUS=2 and N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID=#n_CustomerTypeId:DECIMAL#
update login_rose_rel set STATUS =#login_Status# where N_LOGIN_ID=#n_LoginId# and N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID=#n_CustomerTypeId#
update login_rose_rel set STATUS =4, DESCRIPTION=#description:VARCHAR# where N_LOGIN_ID=#n_LoginId:DECIMAL# and N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID=#n_CustomerTypeId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select:
select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_DATE, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, LOGIN_STATUS, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_DATE, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_DATE, n_Modified, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, N_LEVEL_ID, N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID, LOGIN_ACCOUNT, N_RANK_ID, N_AVAILABLE_INTEGRAL, N_INDIVIDUAL_CREDIT_VALUE, N_EMPIRICAL_VALUE, level_name, rank_name, CUSTOMER_NAME, N_TOTAL_INTEGRAL, status, BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER , BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT, DESCRIPTION, BLINCE_STARTDATE, BLINCE_ENDDATE, BLINCE_VERIFY, CID_VERIFY, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, CREDIT_RATING, IS_VALID, sstatus, RATING_DESCRIPTION
FROM ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID desc) as view_row_number, tt.*, lr.N_LEVEL_ID, ll.N_STATUS as LOGIN_STATUS, cc.customer_type_id as N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID, ll.LOGIN_ACCOUNT, pp.N_RANK_ID, pp.N_AVAILABLE_INTEGRAL, pp.N_INDIVIDUAL_CREDIT_VALUE, pp.N_EMPIRICAL_VALUE, uu.level_name, rr.rank_name, cc.NAME CUSTOMER_NAME, pp.N_TOTAL_INTEGRAL, lr.status, lr.DESCRIPTION, lr.is_valid, s.status as sstatus from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO tt, LOGIN_INFO ll, BNES_CUSTOMER_TYPE cc, PERSONALITY_INFO pp, USER_LEVEL uu, RANK rr, login_rose_rel lr, suppliers_info s where ll.N_LOGIN_ID = pp.N_LOGIN_ID(+) and lr.n_level_id = uu.n_level_id(+) and lr.n_login_id =ll.n_login_id and pp.n_rank_id = rr.n_rank_id(+) and ll.N_LOGIN_ID = tt.N_LOGIN_ID and lr.n_customer_type_id = cc.customer_type_id and lr.n_commercial_id =tt.n_commercial_tenant_id and tt.n_commercial_tenant_id = s.merchant_id(+) and cc.parent_id = 3
ll.LOGIN_ACCOUNT like '%$loginAccount$%'
tt.CONTACTS_NAME like '%$contactsName$%'
tt.BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER like '%$businessLicenceRegister$%'
lr.status = #status:DECIMAL#
tt.MOBILE like '%$mobile$%'
tt.CORPORATE_NAME like '%$corporateName$%'
pp.n_rank_id = #n_RankId:DECIMAL#
lr.n_level_id = #n_LevelId:DECIMAL#
lr.n_customer_type_id = #n_CustomerTypeId:DECIMAL#
) where view_row_number <= #max# and view_row_number > #skip#
and sstatus=#sstatus# or status=#sstatus#

select count(1) the_count from (select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_DATE, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, LOGIN_STATUS, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_DATE, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_DATE, n_Modified, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, N_LEVEL_ID, N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID, LOGIN_ACCOUNT, N_RANK_ID, N_AVAILABLE_INTEGRAL, N_INDIVIDUAL_CREDIT_VALUE, N_EMPIRICAL_VALUE, level_name, rank_name, CUSTOMER_NAME, N_TOTAL_INTEGRAL, status, BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER, BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT, DESCRIPTION, BLINCE_STARTDATE, BLINCE_ENDDATE, BLINCE_VERIFY, CID_VERIFY, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, CREDIT_RATING, IS_VALID, sstatus
FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID desc) as view_row_number, tt.*, lr.N_LEVEL_ID, ll.N_STATUS as LOGIN_STATUS, cc.customer_type_id as N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID, ll.LOGIN_ACCOUNT, pp.N_RANK_ID, pp.N_AVAILABLE_INTEGRAL, pp.N_INDIVIDUAL_CREDIT_VALUE, pp.N_EMPIRICAL_VALUE, uu.level_name, rr.rank_name, cc.NAME CUSTOMER_NAME, pp.N_TOTAL_INTEGRAL, lr.status, lr.DESCRIPTION, lr.is_valid, s.status as sstatus from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO tt, LOGIN_INFO ll, BNES_CUSTOMER_TYPE cc, PERSONALITY_INFO pp, USER_LEVEL uu, RANK rr, login_rose_rel lr, suppliers_info s where ll.N_LOGIN_ID = pp.N_LOGIN_ID(+) and lr.n_level_id = uu.n_level_id(+) and lr.n_login_id = ll.n_login_id and pp.n_rank_id = rr.n_rank_id(+) and ll.N_LOGIN_ID = tt.N_LOGIN_ID and lr.n_customer_type_id = cc.customer_type_id and lr.n_commercial_id = tt.n_commercial_tenant_id and tt.n_commercial_tenant_id = s.merchant_id(+)
and cc.parent_id = 3
ll.LOGIN_ACCOUNT like '%$loginAccount$%'
tt.CONTACTS_NAME like '%$contactsName$%'
tt.MOBILE like '%$mobile$%'
tt.BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER like '%$businessLicenceRegister$%'
lr.status = #status:DECIMAL#
tt.CORPORATE_NAME like '%$corporateName$%'
pp.n_rank_id = #n_RankId:DECIMAL#
lr.n_level_id = #n_LevelId:DECIMAL#
lr.n_customer_type_id = #n_CustomerTypeId:DECIMAL#
))
where sstatus=#sstatus# or status=#sstatus#
